Text:
You can further improve the effects of your feats by spending specialization points.

The benefits of specialization are always listed in regards to the original effects of the related feat.
Increases the movement points bonus granted by Sprint by {0} for each specialization point.
Further increases the critical damage bonus when using Aimed Shot by {0}% (additive to regular critical damage bonus) for each specialization point.
Further increases the critical chance bonus from Ambush by additional {0}% for each specialization point.
Further reduces armor penalty by {0}% for each specialization point.
Further increases the bonus mechanical threshold by {0} for each specialization point.
Reduces cooldown by {0} for each specialization point.
Increases the maximum action points that can be gained by {0} for each specialization point.
Increases bonus damage from broken ribs by additional {0}% per stack for each specialization point.
Further increases bonus critical damage by {0}% for each specialization point.
Further reduces the time it takes to pick and hack locks by {0}% for each specialization point.
Further increases the stealth bonus by {0} for each specialization point.
Further increases the base damage of Neural Overload by {0}% for each specialization point.
Increases the amount of psi points reduction by additional {0}% for each specialization point.
Increases the chance to incapacitate the target by additional {0}% for each specialization point.
Further increases critical damage bonus by {0}% for each specialization point.
Further increases the effective quality by {0}% for each specialization point.
Increases the bonus damage by additional {0}% for each specialization point.
Increases the chance to stun the target by additional {0}% for each specialization point.
Killing an opponent using assault rifle or SMG burst attack will also grant you {0} action points for each specialization point. This, also, can only happen once per turn.

Further increases the critical damage gain by {0}% for each specialization point (per stated condition).

Further increases the extra bleeding damage from the attack by {0}% for each specialization point.
Reduces cooldown by {0} for each specialization point.
Reduces cooldown by {0} for each specialization point.
Increases the number of refunded shots by one.
